articles.title: The Color Purple was filmed in Macon. Soon, it'll be on the big screen - 13WMAZ.com
articles.description: The Color Purple is in theaters Christmas Day. Crews filmed along Third Street in Macon's downtown.
articles.content:
MACON, Ga. Currently, Poplar Street is decorated in lights for the holiday, but in April of last year, it had another fun makeover. 
 Downtown was dressed in 1920s decor from Poplar to Cherry Street… [+2728 chars]

articles.title: Video: Maury Povich makes comeback to reveal paternity results with a twist - CNN
articles.description: Famed television host Maury Povich made a comeback to reveal the paternity of a baby orangutan at the Denver Zoo.
